text_logic_form: Find the length of line JL.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of line JL.
diagram_logic_form: The length of line JK is x+7 units.
The length of line JL is 4x-8 units.
The length of line JK is equal to the length of line JL.
The length of line JK is equal to the length of line KL.
The length of line KL is equal to the length of line JL.
line_instances: There are lines JK, JL, KL.
